name: Black Pudding And Pear Topping
keywords: appetizer, main course, black pudding, pear
recipeIngredient: 2 black pudding sausages, cut in paper-thin slices
Approximately 1 1/2 soft ripe pears, cored and cut in thin slices

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 500 degrees for one hour.
Spread the mascarpone on the dough in the pizza shell. On top, alternate paper-thin slices of black pudding sausage with slices of ripe, peeled pear. Place the rosemary sprigs on top.
Sprinkle with olive oil and pine nuts and bake for 10 minutes.
Remove the pizza from the oven, take off the rosemary sprigs and serve the pizza.
